type ResourcePermissionBase = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Allows control of code access security permissions.

span.span: Allows control of code access security permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別比較字串時，使用序數排序規則，並且忽略要比較之字串的大小寫。The class compares strings using ordinal sort rules and ignores the case of the strings being compared. ## Examples 下列範例會繼承類別。The following example inherits from the class. 4 種建構函式會實作。4 kinds of constructors are implemented. 此範例也會提供類別的實作`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The example also provides an implementation of a class called `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 然後私下設定為的型別`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The property is then privately set to the type of `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 屬性私下設為 「 名稱 」 和 「 機器 」。The property is set privately to "Name" and "Machine". [!code-cpp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CPP/resourcepermissionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CS/resourcepermissionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/VB/resourcepermissionbase.vb#1)]

permission.span: 提供控制辨識項的權限。

span.span: for the right to control evidence.

span.para: 當您繼承自，您必須提供至少三個建構函式，設定兩個屬性，並提供第三個屬性。必要的建構函式： 預設建構函式，會對應到一個做為參數，以及視需要的許多採用屬性的值。需要設定的屬性是和。需要第三個屬性是一個傳回的權限項目。如需此類別實作的範例，請參閱。在，則屬性 「 機器 」 和 「 類別 」，設定私人私下設定為的型別，和屬性傳回的權限項目。

When you inherit from , you must provide at least three constructors, set two properties, and provide a third property. The required constructors are: a default constructor, one that takes a as a parameter, and as many as needed that take values for the properties. The properties that need to be set are and . The third property that is needed is one that returns the permission entries. For an example of an implementation of this class, see . In , the property is set privately to "Machine" and "Category", the property is privately set to the type of , and the property returns the permission entries.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.

returns.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限物件交集是描述一組它們都保留在一般作業的權限。The intersection of two permission objects is a permission that describes the set of operations they both hold in common. 具體來說，它代表要傳遞這兩個權限的要求所需的最低權限。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions required for a demand to pass both permissions.

span.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限物件指定一組完全包含在指定的權限物件的作業，目前的使用權限物件是指定之權限物件的子集。The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object. 例如，表示 C:\Example.txt 的存取權限是 c： 表示存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\Example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的使用權限物件，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定使用權限物件。If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object. 這個方法永遠傳回`false`比目前的使用權限物件不同型別的指定使用權限物件時。This method always returns `false` when the specified permission object is of a different type than that of the current permission object.

summary.span: Creates a permission object that combines the current permission object and the target permission object.

returns.span: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

span.span: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表目前的使用權限物件和指定使用權限物件所代表的所有作業的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission object and the specified permission object. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
